mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fauquier White Sulphur Springs Va: 50 miles, west from Washington, D.C. : This extensive and highly improved establishment is opened for visitors annually, on the 1st of June, and closes on the 1st of October
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Bannerman, W. W. (William W., d. ca. 1846
Fauquier White Sulphur Springs (Hotel : Fauquier County, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A drawing of the hotel and grounds (H. Stone, Del.; W.W. Bannerman, Sc.) at top of sheet, followed by descriptive text in cursive script giving details about access, ammenities and rates.
Appears to have been detached from an unidentified book, with fold lines to 20 x 13 cm.
